mapper.update: INSERT ALL INTO memberid (memberIdx) values (member_seq.NEXTVAL) into member (memberidx,userId,userName,userPwd,tel,zip,addr1,addr2,birth,email,introduce,profile_imageFilename) values (member_seq.NEXTVAL,#{userId}, #{userName}, #{userPwd}, #{tel}, #{zip}, #{addr1}, #{addr2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birth}, #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{introduce, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{profile_imageFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) select * from dual
mapper.select: SELECT memberIdx, userId, userName, userPwd, TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth, email, tel, zip, addr1, addr2 FROM member WHERE userId = #{userId}

SELECT m.memberIdx, membership, NVL(m1.userId, 'guest') userId, NVL(userName, '손님') userName, userPwd, enabled, created_date, modify_date, last_login ,TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth, email, tel, zip, addr1, addr2 FROM member m LEFT OUTER JOIN member1 m1 ON m.memberIdx = m1.memberIdx LEFT OUTER JOIN member2 m2 ON m1.userId = m2.userId WHERE m.memberIdx = #{memberIdx}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET membership = #{membership} WHERE memberIdx=#{memberIdx}
